column4: Does anyone know why my ubuntu is really slow, yet I have 2 gb of RAM?
Hello?
Does anyone know why my ubuntu is really slow, yet I have 2 gb of RAM?
runaway process? right click the panel, add the system monitor. Change the colors for the processor to contrasting ones, you can see your cpu useage clearly
Which processor?
your microprocessor. You can use that tool to see your usage. Nice graphical tool, shows a couple things clearly that top is obscure on
There are like6 that are blue
I have user process green, io as red, the others as blue and yellow.
hnaz: OK, I got both these now, but it looks like they are both really low.
when you say running slow, what exactly do you see? slow startup, slow screen repaint ....
Like, maybe it's just Opera, but that opened really slowly.
And it runs really slowly too.
how about other stuff? If it's just opera, then it's an opera problem not ubuntu
I mean, I don't really use much else...vlc runs fine I suppose.
Isn't Opera the fastest browser?
supposedly. But try some other stuff, make sure it's running right. epiphany for example, it's a quick browser
Oh, also, I don't have the normal broswer, I thought I downloaded some different version.
test stuff.
Haha, how do I do that?
run gedit. is it snappy after you open it? How about openoffice? once it's open, does it lag? That kind of thing
What browser do you use?
firefox mostly.
Swift fox?
